title: DESCRIPTION STATES THIS NO FEE LUXURY APARTMENT IN FULL DETAIL
posting_body: ['Absolutely stunning and spacious Convertible 4 bedroom in one of the most sought after luxury residential in prime Tribeca .', 'The apartment features gorgeous sleek finishes throughout, including stained hardwood floors, oversized windows providing plenty of natural sunlight, and immense closet space.', 'The kitchen was designed to flow seamlessly into the living area.', 'Dishwasher, and extra storage space that are all concealed by dark stained wood cabinetry.', 'The rich, earthy tones throughout the unit evoke a warm and sensual feel to the space that is both welcoming and relaxing.', 'The extra large stone bathroom boasts spa quality finishes, including ambient lighting, a deep soaking tub, Completing the picture, a wide entry hallway creates the perfect separation from the living space and allows for extra storage while the 12 ceilings create an open and grand feel throughout.', 'The building has a Hotel-style lobby feel and reception area, Twenty-four hour concierge, Event Center with hotel quality facilities & amenities, Elegant glass-enclosed private lounge with magnificent river views, billiards table and wet bar, Fully-equipped fitness center, a sun deck with spectacular city and river views, and Valet services including dry cleaning, laundry & housecleaning available', 'Look around Tribeca and you will find a neighborhood filled with every convenience, top restaurants and nightlife, world-class shopping, the city’s best transportation, a continuous waterfront with spectacular river vistas and parks, and the wealthiest destination in the country.']
